headline: UK health regulator approves Moderna's RSV vaccine for adults aged 60 and older
summary: Britain's health regulator said on Friday it has approved Moderna's vaccine for respiratory syncytial virus in adults 60 years and older. The shot, branded as mRESVIA, is for the...
